name: Tragopo Hyper Cannon
tags: ps_weapon_bp, energy18, he17, kinetic18, rare_bp, merc

name: Acris Lance
customPrimary:
Hit on armor or hull %s make the engines (if there are any) flame out for a short duration. 
Increasing beam range will increase flame out duration. (Decreasing will have no effect on flame out duration)

name: Anaxyr Fast Swarmer
customPrimary: When the ship current flux level pass %s or ship system is active, the missiles will deal %s damage instead.

name: Daemeli Focused Railgun
customPrimary: Instantly flameout missile when entering projectile aura.

name: Punctatus Beacher
customPrimary: On hit, creating a quake crater periodically dealing %s damage to foes within a certain radius for a certain duration.

name: Hemiophrys Pure Beam
customPrimary: On hit, recover a small portion of the damage deal as hull regeneration.

name: Arenico Ultra Canon
tags: energy15, kenetic13, he14, SR, restricted, ps_boundless
customPrimary: Every %s-%s, consume up to 3 nearby enemy projectiles to reload the weapon. Reload amount base on number and hit point of the projetile consumed.

name: Alvarius Averting Gun
customPrimary: Every %s shot fired, spawn a decoy flare to distract nearby missiles.

name: Syhadren Pressure Launcher
customPrimary: While missile traveling to target, periodically release smaller missiles dealing KE damage to nearby targets.

name: Onca Discharger
customPrimary: Every %s, when the ship flux level is over %s, if the weapon ammo count is less than max ammo count, it will gain %s ammo. When firing, each shot will consume %s flux. Prioritize hard flux.

name: Proteolytic Focus Beam
customPrimary: Hit on shield/hull/armor trigger EMP arc dealing %s Energy damage equal to the original hit. Deal additional %s Energy damage equal to the original hit base on target's flux level, max out at %s flux level.
